c74object.name: mx-cube
c74object.description: mx-cube cubes a pattern according to the rules of distributive patterns, in accordance with Chapter 12 of Schillinger's book. A pattern of the form (a+b...+n)^3 is multiplied out, without summing the parts, so it becomes a*(a^3+ab...+an)... + a*(am+bm...+m^3)... + m*(a^3+ab...+an)... + m*(am+bm...+m^3)+. A synchronizing pattern is output, being the square of the input pattern, multiplied by the sum of the input pattern. Another synchronizing pattern is output, being the input polynomial, multiplied by the square of the sum of the input pattern.
